name: Pocket Family: Happy Family Plan
overview: Pocket Family - Happy Family Plan is a simulation game in which the player will take control of a whole family and have to take care of all their members (young ones, older ones and even pets), check what they need and make them have the happiest live that they can. The family members got different personalities and demands so you can see them making different activities that goes from use their phones, cooking, play games, play sports, cleaning, rest, sleep, etc. During the game the player can increase his friendship with the family helping them in different mini games and if he win them the friendship will increase. The members of the family grow up and they can get married and got their own sons and daughters, the player can check the family album to see different pictures of all the family members. The game features Pocketstation compatibility.
